thread.title: Robbie Williams to bless Let It Shine final with a Take That reunion | Metro News
thread.title_full: Robbie Williams to bless Let It Shine final with a Take That reunion | Metro News

author: Sarah Deen For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Robbie Williams to bless Let It Shine final with a Take That reunion | Metro News
text:
Sarah Deen for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 7:43 am Robbie Williams is going to help Take That out during the Let It Shine final (Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for Cafe Royal) 
Robbie Williams is going to grace the Let It Shine final with his presence. Sponsored 13 realities of going wedding dress shopping 
Rob is stepping in to join Gary Barlow, Howard Donald and Mark Owen (still no Jason Orange, sorry) for a Take That reunion later on this month. 
He’s going to get a say in who could go on to win the show, too, as he will be a guest judge alongside Gary, Martin Kemp and Dannii Minogue. 
Robbie can’t wait to be back with the Take That boys once more. Let It Shine is hurtling towards its grand final (Picture: BBC/Matt Holyoak) 
He said: ‘I’m looking forward to being back with Gary, Mark and Howard on Let It Shine and am excited to be a guest judge for the very special final.’ 
The episode will see three group’s of singers take to the stage in the hopes of winning the chance to star in a West End musical based on TT’s biggest hits.
